Pompano_Beach.Deerfield Beach Island:
Deerfield Beach Island, also colloquially known as DBI and Deerfield Cay, is an island off the eastern mainland of Boca Raton and Deerfield Beach, Florida, United States.
The island is approximately 5.5 miles long, consisting of three municipalities and two counties. The island runs from Lake Boca and Boca Inlet on the north end through Deerfield Beach to the Hillsboro Inlet and lighthouse on the south end of the island.
